content.question: In addition to the effect of temperature on <math alttext="D M S P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DMSP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> produced by corals and their symbionts, which of the following relationships is also being considered in this experiment?

choices.label: Effect of varying light levels and coral species
Effect of additional <math alttext="D M S P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DMSP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> produced by symbionts and the corals' age
Effect of age and varying light levels
Effect of coral species and additional <math alttext="D M S P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DMSP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> produced by symbionts

content.answer: Effect of additional <math alttext="D M S P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DMSP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> produced by symbionts and the corals' age

skill.text: 3.C: Identify experimental procedures that align with the question, including: i. identifying dependent and independent variables ii. identifying appropriate controls iii. justifying appropriate controls
